projects.title: DubbelDutch
projects.description: DubbelDutch is a Google Chrome extension that provides real-time english translations for npo.nl and kijk.nl. It uses the google translation API to deliver accurate translations of the dutch subtitbles. It has dual language support, allowing users to view both the original Dutch content and the English translation simultaneously.

projects.title: AgriteQ
projects.description: The Qatar International Agricultural Exhibition (AgriteQ) is an annual event that showcases the latest innovations and technologies in the agricultural industry. The AgriteQ website provides information about the exhibition, including event details, exhibitor information, and visitor registration.

projects.title: CineDB
projects.description: CineDB is a web application that allows users to browse and search for movies using the TMDB API. It provides detailed information about each movie, including ratings, reviews, and trailers.

projects.title: REST API Project
projects.description: This project involves developing a RESTful API using Java and Spring Boot. The API provides endpoints for managing resources such as users, products, and orders. It includes features such as authentication, validation, and error handling to ensure a robust and secure API.

projects.title: Entso-E Dashboard
projects.description: A full-stack dashboard for energy management. The dashboard provides real-time data visualization and analytics for energy consumption, production, and distribution. It allows users to monitor and optimize their energy usage, track performance metrics, and make informed decisions to improve energy efficiency.

projects.title: Lung Cancer Detection
projects.description: This project involves developing a Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Network (DCGAN) model for lung cancer detection. The model is trained on a dataset of lung CT scans to identify and classify cancerous nodules. The goal is to improve early detection and diagnosis of lung cancer, ultimately enhancing patient outcomes.

open-source.title: Advent of Code
open-source.description: A collection of coding challenges and puzzles from the Advent of Code event. Each challenge tests problem-solving skills and algorithmic thinking, providing an opportunity to improve coding proficiency and learn new techniques.

open-source.title: Flip Card Component - Animate UI
open-source.description: A reusable flip card component with smooth animations for interactive user interfaces. This component can be used to display content on both sides of the card, enhancing the visual appeal and user experience of web applications.
